The Perfect Gin & Tonic

Pour over extra large chunks of ice with premium tonic water and a twist of orange. Expressing the fragrant oils of orange zest over the surface of your drink will provide the perfect aroma and a perceived acidity that enhances Estia No.7's fusion of citrus, spice and olive for a complex and uniquely smooth drink that cannot be beaten.

Complex & Smooth

The Art of Distilling

There are many gins but not all are created equal. Estia No.7 is an exceptionally smooth London Dry Gin crafted from a unique recipe of rich olive brine, the juice of Porter’s Perfection apples, citrus and select botanicals.

This olive brine mix is combined with the finest British wheat grain spirit and then distilled very slowly in a traditional copper still to extract the essential oils and flavour the base spirit.

The process of slow distillation and combination of flavours and oils are harmoniously presented. The result is a complex and extremely well-rounded gin that is uniquely smooth.

"We only use the heart of the distillation in Estia No.7 which is then reduced to bottle strength by hydrating with local spring water"

Unique Taste

Estia No.7 Gin stands out from the crowd. Many of the ingredients such as juniper, angelica root, coriander, rosemary, thyme and cardamom are the mainstays of many a gin recipe but these traditional notes are transformed with the addition of our rich olive brine. The recipe is lifted with citrus and distilled as one for an alluring taste. Estia No.7 is a wonderfully smooth, clean gin with a delicate taste of orange, apples and cardamom, enhanced by the olive brine distillation. It’s a big gin that’s smooth enough to be enjoyed on its own but bold enough to excite mixologists and cocktail makers everywhere.
